name: Goblin's Gambit
description:
Goblin’s Gambit is a real-time strategy game played in an arena-style map. Four teams composed of six goblins will compete to hoard the most gold by the end of the round. Collect gold by slaying alligatormen and enemy goblins, or by stealing from the arena treasure hoard and the enemy teams’ chests. The team with the most gold when the timer runs out, wins.

Credits:

  • Kaleb Fick / Producer, Game Designer, Scripter
  • Ashley Fortin / Character Modeler
  • Dalton Logsdon / Game Designer, Level Designer
  • Mark Celentano / Environment Modeler, Prop Modeler
  • Dia Rosales / Game Designer, Level Designer
  • Hee Yoon Kang / Character Modeler
  • Branden Lowe / UI/UX Design
  • Instuctor: Lori Hyrup
  • Made in GAM 310: Prototype Production Studio, and further refinement as a personal project

Platform/System:

  • Built in Unity
  • For Windows PC
